briefTitle: A Multicenter, Open-label Study for E7040 in Japanese Subjects With Hypervascular Tumor and Subjects With Arteriovenous Malformation
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-label Study for E7040 in Japanese Subjects With Hypervascular Tumor and Subjects With Arteriovenous Malformation
summary: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of transcatheter arterial embolization with E7040 in Japanese subjects with hypervascular tumor or arteriovenous malformation

primaryOutcome.measure: Success Rate of Embolization in the Target Vessel
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Day 1 (embolization) up to Day 30 after treatment
